mapper.select: SELECT ad.ano, ad.apasswd, ad.atel, ad.aemail, ad.aname, ad.hiredate, ad.reg_date, alevel_bcd, alevel_mcd, astatus_bcd, astatus_mcd, cm1.CONTENT AS level_content, -- cm1의 CONTENT 컬럼 cm2.CONTENT AS status_content, -- cm2의 CONTENT 컬럼 cm1.bcd AS cm1_bcd, -- cm1의 bcd 컬럼 cm2.bcd AS cm2_bcd -- cm2의 bcd 컬럼 FROM common cm1 INNER JOIN admin ad ON ad.alevel_bcd = cm1.bcd AND ad.alevel_mcd = cm1.mcd INNER JOIN common cm2 ON ad.astatus_bcd = cm2.bcd AND ad.astatus_mcd = cm2.mcd WHERE ad.ano = #{ano}
